au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1=12m_L2=1.3m_offset
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5.0) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength', 5) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(510,300) # Drive entrance aperture to 50 mm square driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive guide to g3 driveGuide(guideConfig.g3) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g3) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 10 mm sics.drive('apx', -72) # Drive beamstops up selBs(4) # set beamcentres sics.set('beamcenterx', 37.86) sics.set('beamcenterz', 96.50)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(50.5, 100) # Drive attenuator to 300 driveAtt(300)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(50.5, 0) driveBsz(263.5)
